body: thank you very much devang i when i tried simplified plans for lighting, i had a new problem when i needed to creat new HBzones with the new lighting schedules in your plan each floor will have only 1 schedule output but it consists of 5 different zones  i have fatal error in SETZONESSCHEDULES component [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/klx1aEk42Wq3*Z2AyxSz7fyQpQpiIc7WGforFFk7BFRG-BIu609L558pjixN5uTtAvkny3r0SRxxMRkoDyKsGyLE*MXh5EDJ/setzonesschedules.png)
